lines.text: Eh? Who’s she?
<f=OpenDyslexicSmall>Dr. Opal Whydah. Forensics. My wife’s ex. Here to support the investigation with… forensic stuff.</f>
<f=OpenDyslexicSmall>I’d like this to look good, understand? She acts polite, but she’ll take any excuse to drag me through the mud. Serious grudge.</f>
<f=OpenDyslexicSmall>Oh-ho? You want me to help you look good, Leo?</f>
<f=OpenDyslexicSmall>Please. I know we don’t quite get along, but...</f>
<f=OpenDyslexicSmall>Something in it for me?</f>
<f=OpenDyslexicSmall>I’ll push to shorten your parole. Just… at least pretend to take this seriously, okay?</f>
<f=OpenDyslexicSmall>Heh heh heh…</f>
<f=OpenDyslexicSmall>I’ll hold you to that, boss man.</f>
Excuse me? What are you two... muttering about?
This- this is the consultant, right?
That’s me! Star Seeker, at your service.
Leo here was just about to brief me on the case.
Uh, yes.
Looks like the guy by the door, <c=#FF00FF>whoever he is,</c> died... somehow. I'd bet dollars to donuts we'll find a <c=#FF00FF>cause of death</c> around here somewhere.
Probably.
Yeah, probably.
We've also got us a dead wizard, but we don't know <c=#FF00FF>what kind, 'zactly…</c> we'll need to figure out <c=#FF00FF>cause of death</c> for him, too.
We've got <c=#FF00FF>some kinda hologram</c> by the door here... <c=#FF00FF>where'd it come from?</c> Some sorta hocus pocus antics, no doubt. Blasted wizards.
None taken.
What?
Sorry, did you not say ''no offense''?
No.
I didn't.
...That's fair.
Oh, and there's a suspicious wizard statue sitting there. Don't know <c=#FF00FF>where that's from</c> either. Lord knows what that's all about.
Is that it?
Well, I’m sure there’s more to it. Take a look around and see what you can find.
Move around with the arrow keys, and press C or the spacebar to inspect stuff around the crime scene.
(If I find any evidence, I can press A or D to review it in my head.)
If you think you’ve got an answer to one of my questions, <c=#FF00FF>talk to me</c> to go over the hypothesis.
Right. Let’s get down to business, yeah?
